about_the_game:
"Bug Butcher" is an exhilarating roguelite action game that throws players into the shoes of Harry, a fearless and skilled exterminator tasked with saving humanity from a relentless and overwhelming bug infestation.

In a distant future, humanity has colonized distant planets. However, a disastrous experiment has gone awry, leading to a catastrophic outbreak of mutated insects. As the Bug Butcher, Harry must venture into these infested planets to exterminate the swarms of creepy-crawlies and prevent the infestation from spreading to other colonies.

FEATURES
  • Roguelike Action: Bug Butcher offers a dynamic roguelike experience with procedurally generated levels, ensuring no two playthroughs are the same. Players must adapt to new challenges, making each run exciting and unpredictable.
  • Intense Bug-Slaying Gameplay: Armed with a powerful shotgun, players engage in fast-paced and satisfying combat as they shoot, dodge, and strategize their way through swarms of diverse and relentless bugs.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Confronting brutal and gigantic bug bosses provides thrilling encounters that test players' skills and reflexes. Each boss has unique attack patterns, requiring strategic thinking and precise timing to overcome.
  • Progression and Upgrades: Despite the challenge of permadeath, players can gain experience and unlock new upgrades and abilities between runs. This progression system motivates players to improve their skills and try new strategies.
  • Immersive Art and Audio: Bug Butcher's vibrant and cartoonish art style complements the game's frantic action, while the energetic soundtrack enhances the adrenaline-pumping atmosphere, immersing players in the bug-infested world.
